sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STOLBERG, a ſmall town of Germany, in the circle of Upper Saxony, and territory of Thuringia, of which it is the capital place. It is ſeated between two mountains, 58 miles north-west of Leipſic. E. Long, II. 8. N. Lat. 51. 42.
